data.title: Madeleine Stowe
data.text:
Born: 18-Aug-1958

Birthplace: Los Angeles, CA

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The General's Daughter

"I'd only had sex with one other person before I met Brian [Benben] and he was a much older man. And no, it was not Dennis Quaid." Calgary Sun.

Father: (British, d. 1983)

Mother: (Costa Rican)

Husband: Brian Benben (actor, m. 1982, one daughter)

Daughter: May

High School: Glendale High School, Glendale, CA

University: University of Southern California

John Edwards for President

TELEVISION

Revenge Victoria Grayson (2011-)
